website_summaries.verdict: ExpressVPN's Android VPN offers a good number of servers across many countries, but its high price and so-so performance in our tests hold it back.

customer_reviews.title: BBC has been blocked for a week
customer_reviews.text: This VPN supplier has apps for Windows, Android and Fire TV. All was sweetness and light and I got an extra month "free" by signing up for a year. But last Sunday the BBC was blocked and I was promised that their engineers were working hard to fix this. After a week it has not been fixed. I am trying to find a way of extracting myself from a year's contract given that what was offered is not being supplied.
customer_reviews.author: Johnashp

customer_reviews.title: Great VPN but a little pricey...
customer_reviews.text: By far the best premium VPN I have used and I have tried lots. Once the initial setup was complete, which all of 5 minutes the app can automatically run in the background without any further input from you which is great. Never experienced any problems with connection or speed, the only issue for me was cost. Its not overly expensive in comparison to the other top ranked VPN's however, i currently pay £2.50 per month for Digibit VPN which more servers to choose from and also provides details of there specific function with equally reliable connection and speeds
customer_reviews.author: Warren Bristow

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended by the industry but it seems to be one of the most expensive. Easy to use and install though. Not sure if I will upgrade to the paid version.
customer_reviews.author: TOAO 🏳️‍🌈

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Pricey and every other VPN I have used has throttled my I-Net. For example I am on just shy of 400mbs down and with this vpn on it takes the speed down to 200mbs+ so nearly 50% of my speed is affected. Would like a more modern and detailed UI however its fine to use. Can view Netlfix in other counties but sometimes this doesn’t always work. Used with IPTV and it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Ibrar

customer_reviews.title: great for those who work abroad
customer_reviews.text: if you work in a country where the language is foreign to your native tongue it's nice sometimes to switch on the telly and watch a bit of tv - the same programs you would have done had you been home. ExpressVPN allows me to do that. Any technical hitches, a quick email to the team and a response usually within 24 hours gets it sorted first time all but once in the years I've been using them.
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix Rising

customer_reviews.title: Express VPN is one of the best out there!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using ExpressVPN now for a while on my Amazon Firestick and it's great. It's very easy to install. Simply create an account and login. Decide on your subscription then pay and away you go! You can chose from various different locations around the world . Protect yourself and stay safe online. I would highly recommend ExpressVPN.
customer_reviews.author: Hiten L

customer_reviews.title: Had a problem with original system
customer_reviews.text: After a break of several months it would not connect. With help from online support - Raid - it was necessary to uninstall on both our Kindle Fires and then re-install. Then worked okay but a bit of a pain to have wasted quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: P. Prior

customer_reviews.title: Works, research best way to use !
customer_reviews.text: Have to admit, my first failings with this VPN where down to my human error. I would advise anyone not to save sites on their browser while still in uk and with VPN uninstalled or not switched on. Works ok.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Keane

customer_reviews.title: To get it resolved so I can see if the app really works or get the subscription stopped
customer_reviews.text: Having problems with login on this app as it keeps saying it doesn’t accept the password even though I’ve changed it via the email link Tried the chat line but no answer! Tried 4 times to send email but they came back saying server did not recognise it, just had one reply saying to check the internet even though I told them it’s a login problem
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Brougham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fast VPN can be used up to 5 devices. I have running on Android and a FireStick currently. Fast and easy connection with split tunnelling option for apps. Not throttled and preserving my privacy at all times :)
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but works.
customer_reviews.text: Its very expensive for a VPN but it works better than my previous Nord VPN. Nord would be recognized by a certain streaming service but Express bypasses that. In short if it works its worth it if you want to stream undetected.
customer_reviews.author: Ade247

customer_reviews.title: Disables voice commands on firestick
customer_reviews.text: Might hide you but it also disables your firestick from connecting to your alexa and stops all your voice commands. Only activate if your happy to use only the remote
customer_reviews.author: miss m bradley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use ExpressVPN for more than a year and It works exactly as it should. Never had any problems with the app across different platforms. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind protection
customer_reviews.text: Nice protection from snoopers and ISP's. Amazon prime movies doesn't seem to like it though as won't let me play films whilst active. I'm sure that Express will work round it though.
customer_reviews.author: beardy

customer_reviews.title: But expensive
customer_reviews.text: Great for a monthly subscription & can cancel at any time, but very expensive over the yr!!! & it often loses signal & takes its time to re-connect
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for a few days
customer_reviews.text: We had to claim the money back - but this was quite easy!
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Bet vpn you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Express vpn has a host of client installers for various devices and all have the same user interface. It has alot inbuilt functions so you can verify your connection and where it's located. For a improvement I would suggest a kill switch like nord does.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good but expensive
customer_reviews.text: The best around but firvorice 3 devices in s multiple device ensues expensive

customer_reviews.title: Excellent VPN
customer_reviews.text: Very effective and reliable VPN. Works perfectly on all 3 devices I've used it with. Only ever had one issue with it not connecting properly to the country I wanted and the customer service team resolved it quickly and easily :)
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Williams

customer_reviews.title: VPN set up was so simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Did some initial research and this app and service came out as one of the best. Does what it says on the box and very easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Very good VPN
customer_reviews.text: Good VPN. Seems to require reconnect on Firestick. Possibly because another VPN, Nord, which does not seem as connective for Netflix and Prime, is also on stick.

customer_reviews.text: Love this app. Express really helps me access the sites I need to use. Would recommend for use in countries with blockers or for those wanting to use sites only accessible in certain territories.

Unlike my current provider who considers game chat servers as torrents and blocks them.
